title: dialogue
description: Opens NPC dialogue for a player. See the page on the [Dialogue documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/minecraft/creator/documents/npcdialogue#dialogue-command) for more information.

fields.title: npc
fields.description: Required. The target for the NPC menu. Must be a [target selector](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) for an entity with type NPC.

fields.title: player
fields.description: Target to display menu. A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: sceneName
fields.description: A `string` that specifies the scene file to run from the behavior pack.

fields.title: players
fields.description: Target to display menu. A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

overloads.title: Dialogue with NPC and player, optional sceneName
overloads.description: Open a specific scene with an `npc` and `player` using an optional `sceneName`.

overloads.title: Dialogue with NPC and sceneName, optional player
overloads.description: Change the dialogue `npc` and `sceneName`, with an optional `player`.
